Bluehost: This platform is our best friend when it comes to hosting small to medium scale websites.. They offer a variety of benefits to help online businesses such as reseller hosting. It is also known as the best web hosting page
SiteGround: This hosting site believes on its handcrafted philosophy, that is, its unique service and higher quality. It is focused on security, speed and support. These qualities make this site superior in the hosting arena.
MDD Hosting: This is a web hosting platform that offers high quality service and support for online businesses. It gives affordable prices on its hosting services around the world.
HostGator: It now offers unlimited web hosting packages. This is a worldwide provider of shared, reseller, VPS and dedicated web hosting for both beginners and professionals.
ManageWP: One of the most amazing plugins there is. It can manage all WordPress sites in one powerful dashboard. It has first class support too.
GravityForms: This is the best contact form plugin powered by WordPress. It can build and publish forms in just minutes. It is also packed with totally exciting features.
WooCommerce: This is a powerful plugin that helps to sell anything. It has beautiful features that can helps attract viewers and earn more customers. Its customer service will help with no hassle involved.
Memberful: This platform will help save time in selling memberships online. It makes all the work easy with its powerful features. Importantly, it makes it easy for the community to support the work involved.
Quick Cache: This is a really good WordPress plugin that can speed-up the site. Apart from being easy to install, it provides reliable and easy-to-use page caching.
Total Cache: It has an easy web performance optimization (WPO) using caching as a WordPress plugin. It is trusted by thousands of companies as it improves user experience and page speed.
iThemes Security Pro: This is a powerful plugin that has the easiest and fastest way to secure the WordPress site. It has numerous features such as obscuring, detecting, protecting and recovering the site.
Yoast SEO: It will improve the site’s SEO in all aspects. This is a plugin that will help write better content and have a fully optimized WordPress page. It is easy to configure. It is also intuitive, which can is time-saving in itself.
Pingdom: This is a free website where WordPress sites can be tested. It monitors uptime and response time and informs the user if something is wrong. Learning whether one’s site speed is fast or slow is now easy.
BackWPup: This is the perfect backup plugin for any WordPress site. It schedules automatic backup on WordPress installations. It is easy to set up and has a complete backup solution for the site.
WooThemes: This is called the ultimate WordPress Toolkit. It will enhance the appearance of the website. New themes are uploaded everyday from world’s top designers.
ThemeFuse: This platform has also different kinds of themes to choose from. They have more than 25 for anyone’s site. It has also different theme for photography, food, business, games and the likes.
MailChimp: When sending email through multiple users MailChimp is the way to go. You can start out for free for your first 2000 subscribers which is a great deal itself.
LeadPages: This is a perfect marketing platform that creates pages for the clients. It has the simplest landing page builder in the industry. It has so many features like complete hosting of pages and simple but fast WP integration that can be used automatically.
GoDaddy Domain Names: This is a platform that helps people easily start, confidently grow and successfully run their own ventures. It lets clients create a domain name and website. It also provides easy access in finding a great domain name for its clients.
PlaceIt by Breezi: Using this freelance tool, placing the backstory of the app becomes easy in seconds. Screenshots can be used as marketing collateral.
ScreenGrab Extension for Firefox: It is a Mozilla Firefox extension. It easily saves web pages as images. It also has a new feature which uploads the images to the Internet.
